item.title: Cheerios parent General Mills to sacrifice some profit to drive sales for ‘cautious’ consumers, and the stock is dropping
item.description: General Mills will look to keep prices low, with a focus on sales growth.

item.title: Nvidia’s $1.4 trillion comeback is just about complete. The stock is headed for a record.
item.description: This is why the stock is on pace to reach a new all-time closing high and reclaim its spot as the largest company by market capitalization.

item.title: My job is offering me a payout. Should I take a $61,000 lump sum or $355 a month for life?
item.description: “My S&P 500 investments have roughly doubled every seven years.”

item.title: We’re living in ‘end times’ when you can’t retire on $1 million
item.description: Inflation is the dry rot that eats away at your dreams while you’re busy planning your retirement.

item.title: Why this banking proposal may mean good news for the bond market and investors
